Sentence: LeBron James scored 30 points against the Warriors.
Stephen Curry hit seven three-pointers against the Lakers.
Giannis Antetokounmpo grabbed 15 rebounds in Milwaukee.
Jayson Tatum assisted Jaylen Brown for a dunk.
Nikola Jokic recorded a triple-double against the Suns.
Kevin Durant blocked three shots during the game in Phoenix.
Joel Embiid led the 76ers to a victory over the Knicks.
Luka Doncic hit a game-winning shot against the Clippers.
Jimmy Butler stole the ball and scored on a fast break.
Anthony Edwards dunked over two defenders in Minneapolis.
